boardgame.name: Marvel Dice Masters: Civil War
boardgame.description: Marvel Dice Masters: Civil War is a collectible dice-building tabletop game designed by Quarriors! creators Michael Elliott and Eric M. Lang._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;WizKids has announced a Civil War set for its popular Marvel Dice Masters Collectible Dice Game. Marvel Dice Masters: Civil War will include Starter Sets, Foil Packs, a Team Box, a Collector_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s Box, a Playmat, and a Dice Bag. Release is planned for May._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Based on the Marvel comic book Civil War storyline, the set will include iconic characters from both sides of the conflict, like Spider-Man, Captain America, and Iron Man. It will also introduce new mechanics for the game: Thunderbolts, Enlistment, and New Warriors._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: Dice Masters Civil War SET ALL Basic Action Cards ALL Common Cards (including Starter Set) ALL Uncommon Cards ALL Rare Cards BONUS: New Civil War Playmat (sealed) 4 x Dice for each character except (3x Captain America, 2x Vibranium Shield, Venom, Ironman, Ronin)

This is a full set of Civil War Dice Masters (Including all Super Rares) and includes max dice for all cards. This comes in a Civil War collector_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s box. This does not include any alternate art Super Rares. Playmat is also available for an additional amount. Shipping is USPS Medium Flat Rate box actual price.
Verkaufe hier ein neues Starter Set in de/fr.

Full set of Common, Uncommon, Rares. Missing 7 Super Rares (Ronin, Deathlok, Maria Hill, Shannon Carter, Venom, Natalia Romanova, Iron Man). All cards are sleeved and include max dice. Message me for more details and be sure to check out my other Dicemasters sales! See https://boardgamegeek.com/geekmarket/product/1297848 for pics of my complete collection.
